document.full_text: two people died and scores were hurt on sunday when yemeni police fired live rounds and tear gas at protesters in sanaa and aden demanding an end to president ali abdullah saleh's 32-year rule, medical sources said.
document.title: two dead as yemen police fire on protesters
lines_and_colors: two people died and scores were hurt on sunday when yemeni police fired live rounds and tear gas at protesters in sanaa and aden demanding an end to president ali abdullah saleh's 32-year rule, medical sources said.
